title: Bella Thorne Reveals New Girlfriend In Steamy Photos
text:
Bella Thorne has shared a new romance in her life, and although the star has a new girlfriend, she hasn't ended things with her boyfriend.

Bella took to Instagram on Sunday and showed some very revealing photos of herself rolling around in bed with a woman.

"She’s very cute ... first girl I have dated that’s camera shy," she captioned the photos.

Related:

Bella Thorne Packs On PDA With Boyfriend in The Mediterranean

Bella Thorne Bloodied After Bringing 'Tampon' Into the Ocean

Bella Thorne Slams Ex Tana Mongeau For Hanging With Mod Sun: 'She Broke Girl Code'

Bella Thorne Gets Blunt About Recent Drama at Miami Yacht Party

Bella Thorne's Friends Throw Massive Party at Her House, LAPD Responds to Possible 'Shots Fired'

The mystery woman's face is covered, keeping her identity a secret, but Bella definitely felt that the relationship was worthy of going Instagram Official.

Even though she's smitten, Bella hasn't exactly ended things with her boyfriend, Benjamin Mascolo, who voiced his opinion on the new relationship.

"You girls are cute," Benjamin commented underneath the photo of his girlfriend and her girlfriend.

Bella and Benjamin have been hot and heavy since earlier this year following the very public breakup with her ex-boyfriend, rapper Mod Sun.
